short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Performance Data on your Marketplace Page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Vendor or Seller on an E-commerce Marketplace? Use Merchant AI's Chrome Extension to see your product data in context within the Marketplace's Product's Page.

Key Performance Measures such as:
- Sales, COGS, Margins, ...
- Quantities Sold, in Inventory, Replaced, Returned,...
- Traffic, Impressions, Conversions
- and Much More!

This product requires purchase of a Merchant Assistant SaaS Subscription, in order to see your data. Find out more at: https://www.merchant-ai.com
